properties.title: Welcome to the AJF Persistence Developer Website : Module Implementation

section.name: Welcome
section.p:
This module contain the implementation of the Persistence CDI extension.
The implementation is split into the following packages :
ajf.persistence.jpa : Contain the extension entrypoint (JPAExtension) and the interfaces used by the implementation
ajf.persistence.jpa.impl : Contain the different impl of the interface and the core implementation of the code generation (using Javaassist)
